Smart Watering Can: A watering can that uses sensors to monitor the moisture levels in the soil and only waters when necessary. This helps conserve water and save time.
Self-Watering Can: A watering can that has a built-in water pump that automaticallys water to the plants at regular intervals.
Solar-Powered Watering Can: A watering can that uses solar energy to power a water pump, making it an eco-friendly option for gardeners.
Voice-Activated Watering Can: A watering can that can be controlled by voice commands, allowing gardeners to water their plants without having to physically lift the can.
Watering Can with Built-in Fertilizer: A watering can that has a built-in fertilizer dispenser, allowing gardeners to easily add nutrients to their plants while watering.
